mapper.insert: INSERT INTO summoner (profileIconId, name, puuid, summonerLevel, revisionDate, id, accountId) VALUES (#{profileIconId},#{name},#{puuid},#{summonerLevel},#{revisionDate},#{id},#{accountId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM summoner WHERE 1=1 AND REPLACE(name, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value} ,'%')
